editorialNotes.standard: With relaxed swapping rules and charming graphics, this surprisingly slick match-3 puzzler makes the genre feel fresh again.

Tiny Wings has been a longtime favorite of ours, thanks to its gentle vibe, fantastic music, and surprisingly awesome one-touch gameplay. Outrunning the sun across procedurally generated islands is rewarding and relaxing, and we love the added challenge of the four-bird race mode. The gameâ€™s vivid, vibrant colors absolutely dazzle on Apple TVâ€”we feel like weâ€™re meeting our flightless friends for the first time again.
Are aliens really out there? Discover the truth by rummaging through crop circles, pizza trucks, and more in this interactive hidden-object game.

editorialNotes.standard: Zipping down snowy hills, trying to stay ahead of a massive avalancheâ€”the pressureâ€™s always on in this infinite-racing classic. And we love that whirlwind pace, fueled by landing backflips and hitching rides on penguins, snowmobiles, and yetis. From the gameâ€™s masterful one-touch controls to its cheery music, every aspect feels perfectly tuned to keep you playing through long afternoons and late nights.

editorialNotes.standard: Part platformer, part puzzler, Edge has infatuated gamers almost since the opening of the App Store. Guide a nimble cube around the narrow ledges and ever-shifting corridors of a treacherous 3D world, unlocking secrets and collecting items without falling into space. Stylishly minimalist visuals and a slick electronic soundtrack make Edgeâ€™s mix of path-finding challenges and pitfall-avoiding thrills easy to get lost in. Its dozens of levels of perfectly balanced gameplay redefine how much fun simplicity and sophistication can be.

If you took Super Hexagon, Impossible Road, andÂ TempestÂ and shoved them in a blender, the resulting smoothie would probably taste like Octagon. Itâ€™s a psychedelic infinite runner backed by lean-mean electronic music and a difficulty thatâ€™ll have you begging for mercy while you tap Retry.

Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: With Free App of the Week, we highlight a great app you can enjoy at no charge this week. (In-App Purchases sold separately.) ZeptoLabâ€™s highly anticipated sequel is an absolute blast, filled with endless charm and brilliantly designed physics-based puzzles. Use all-new allies and abilities to feed the adorable Om Nom candy while navigating each stageâ€™s unique layout and collecting stars along the way. With new mechanics smartly layered onto the seriesâ€™ already famous gameplay, Cut the Rope 2 is continually challenging and engaging.

One of the App Storeâ€™s early sensations, Doodle Jump HD has only improved with age. The superbly simple gameplay remains: tilt your device to hop up an endless series of platforms, blasting bad guys, grabbing power-ups, and making your mark on a global leaderboard. Hand-drawn visuals add quirky appeal, while an evolving mix of doodled worlds, special items, and whimsical characters keep this indie classic fresh.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: How far can you roll a sphere down a super-steep, never-ending ramp before falling off? Find out in this devilishly tough but instantly accessible score-based racing gameâ€”a masterpiece whose simple controls and wonderfully minimalist presentation will keep you coming back again and again. Whether you stick to the road with precision driving or fling yourself into the unknown with wild jumps, youâ€™ll be engrossed and pushed to your limits.

editorialNotes.short: This stylish runner made a big impact when it first launched, and it's still a blast.
editorialNotes.standard: Race through a collapsing city in a game that helped launch the infinite runner genre. From its gorgeous music to its searing imageryâ€”exploding windows, falling buildingsâ€”Canabalt overflows with style and atmosphere. Surviving even a single minute requires split-second reflexes and a whole lot of luck. Plus, after years of updatesâ€”including all-new modes like shared-screen multiplayerâ€”this already epic game has been polished to perfection.
